content: I have tried many different high end foundations and this is my favorite by far. I don't spray on my face but on my hand and apply with a brush.  The finished look is fantastic!
I love this, my go to foundation!! Beautiful finish.

I have been using AirFlash for over 2 years and though I initially thought this product was too pricey, I quickly realized that it was worth every penny. There are many ways to apply, but I choose to spray product on a kabuki brush for maximum coverage. I use this every day and one can lasts at least 4 months. I use the 300 shade.
title: Best Foundation - My Holy Grail!
My go to foundation, beautiful finish!
A must have
A good foundation....
